medical_history.chief_complaint: Dyspnea, heart palpitations, and lower extremity edema.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Initially presented in June 2015. Symptoms have progressed with declining functional status leading to hospitalization. In November 2016, presented with miscarriage, transvaginal bleeding, and further declining functional status that necessitated admission.
medical_history.past_medical_history: No pathological antecedents prior to initial presentation in June 2015.
